title: Thinking Fast and Slow - purpose of "doggie"

content.question: Which purpose does the discussion of the "doggie" (Paragraph 4) primarily serve?

choices.label: It contextualizes the accomplishments of experts.
It demonstrates the flexibility of the young brain.
It shows how learning takes place in the brain.
It indicates the importance of early experiences.

content.answer: It contextualizes the accomplishments of experts.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
